website_summaries.verdict: This is a great tome that gives you the history behind and understanding of the DASH diet – how it was formulated and how and why it works.
pros: Book is more of a comprehensive introduction to the diet and understanding how to make food and lifestyle choices that comply with DASH
Tips such as focusing on smaller portions and lowering sodium
Easy and straightforward, clear and informative
cons: Some users found the info here too basic and elementary, and too similar to other diet plans

customer_reviews.title: Considered the best diet
customer_reviews.text: A diet book that encourages dieters to lower their intake of sodium (salt) and increase consumption of calcium, magnesium and potassium. Gina Crawford, the author does this by listing the various foods we are allowed to eat and not allowed to eat on this diet, which includes vegetables, meats and seafood, dairy and grains. Also there is a DASH seven-day meal plan which shows breakfast, morning snake, lunch, afternoon snack and dinner for a whole week
customer_reviews.author: Denniger BoltonTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Easy Read
customer_reviews.text: For a couple searching for a reasonable plan, this is the ticket! We are on WEEK 2 with some success and keeping it going. We Have tried several good plans in the book and recipes too. Eating healthier is what everyone should be doing! Try the Dash Diet it works.
customer_reviews.author: Lala E

customer_reviews.title: Excellent easy diet to follow and good for your health!
customer_reviews.text: This diet lowered my BP to the point I have gone off my medication as per my doctor. My average Bp is 116/76😊
customer_reviews.author: T. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: I learned how to cook the fruits and vegetables on how to obtain their most important nutrients!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people now a day’s mostly suffer or experiencing High blood pressure, diabetes and cardiovascular diseases as a result of our unhealthy lifestyle and foods that we eat. And so this dash diet was discovered and proven effective for lowering and reducing risk for having such conditions. And this guide has a step by step guide that is easy to follow the correct dash diet to follow. And I learned from this guide the how to cook fruits and vegetables on how to obtain the most important nutrients from them. This is very informational diet guide.
customer_reviews.author: Thea

customer_reviews.title: Great mini book
customer_reviews.text: Gave good info on the basic diet info, including why to eat healthier, examples of menues and a cook book. Focus was on foods I as an average grocery shopper can find and afford.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: This diet was recommended by my doctor
customer_reviews.text: This diet was recommended by my doctor. This book helps to get started painlessly. It allows you acclimate your mind and body for the new lifestyle. If you are diabetic, pre-diabetic or have high blood pressure, this is the way for you, but anyone can benefit from adopting​ this diet to their own lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Janto2

customer_reviews.title: Simply Great
customer_reviews.text: Great concept.Easy to follow. Straight to the point without terminology that requires a PhD in nutrition. The best part of the book was that it was short and ended with recipes. When changing from one eating style to another recipes are important.
customer_reviews.author: Nopohboy

customer_reviews.title: To call the DASH diet just a diet is to really do it a disservice, it's a healthy lifestyle eating plan
customer_reviews.text: The idea behind the DASH diet is to help control hypertension, but it's actually a well rounded eating plan as well. While not designed specifically to cause weight-loss, it actually does an admirable job since, by it's very structure, promotes eating much healthier in order to lower blood pressure. This book does a great job going into detail why this is a great diet to follow and provides numerous recipes to follow for every meal of the day, along with snacks. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Charles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent resource!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a very well written and indepth guide to what the DASH Diet is and how to properly follow it. It also goes into detail about how its good and includes very well thought out meal plans and recipies. I highly recomment this book over many of the other guides on the DASH Diet that I have read that have a fraction of the content and information that this one does.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Elliot

customer_reviews.title: A diet that delivers
customer_reviews.text: My husband has suffered from high blood pressure for decades and now I feel like I have some solid advice on how to address this growing concern of ours. This book does a wonderful job of explaining what the dash diet is and how it works and also how to implement it so that you can start to address wight issues and lower blood pressure at the same time. A must read!
customer_reviews.author: VanessaCorazon

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Was not real happy with this book. There were misspelled words and incorrect punctuation in it. Also, it was just a brief outline of the DASH diet and not really all that helpful. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: wize1

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was a great introductory guide to the DASH Diet
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great introductory guide to the DASH Diet. The information was informative and helpful, providing clear, well-researched chapters regarding the benefits of DASH, portion control (tailored to suit individual needs), food lists and some great recipes. I can happily recommend this book to anyone trying to suss out the DASH Diet.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Walters

customer_reviews.title: Fruits and veggies
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect random information. I thought it would be more specific as to how to implement small changes over time. I can't say it isn't helpful, but pretty generic, like most nutrition books these days. Eat your fruits and vegetables. Who hasn't heard that?
customer_reviews.author: Suerose

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great primer for anyone getting into the DASH diet. Plenty of information about the common food groups. Plus the recipes are very helpful. They are designed to be made fast and painlessly, even if you’re a cooking novice. Overall this is a good book for anyone getting into DASH dieting.
customer_reviews.author: CTK

customer_reviews.title: Great book for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This was a great explanation of the Dash diet. There was a breakdown of EXACTLY how much of what kind of foods we can and cannot eat. Very helpful book with detail explanation for beginners looking for information on The Dash Diet
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: to the point and easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: Short, concise, to the point and easy to understand. Highly recommend to people on the go and interested in a healthy blood pressure controlling diet that does not include anything other than buying, ordering and eating healthy foods.
customer_reviews.author: G Buddy Nichols

customer_reviews.title: A bit thin in content but nevertheless a useful guide for getting started on the DASH diet
customer_reviews.text: A bit thin in content but nevertheless a useful guide for getting started on the DASH diet. My blood pressure has gone down and seems to be staying down.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Landau

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do not use this diet thought I was going to
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great book for those just starting out and wanting to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great book for those just starting out and wanting to learn about the Dash diet to help prevent HTN or keep it under control, very simple to follow!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Fenner

customer_reviews.title: Great Low sodium diet help
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been diagnosed with hypertension. A low sodium diet is a must. I found this book very helpful in preparing enjoyable meals while monitoring sodium. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ed Reid

customer_reviews.title: I love the Dash diet. I feel great
customer_reviews.text: I do not get headaches nor do I feel hungry. I have been on the diet for less than a week and am looking forward to getting on the scale by the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Louise E Baker

customer_reviews.title: Dash Diet to manage high blood pressure
customer_reviews.text: The author does an incredible job describing the Dash diet and its characteristics and why the DASH diet is so useful. It is not simply another diet but more a food strategy recommended by The Mayo Clinic, The American Heart Association, The American College of Cardiology and so on. The book is easy to understand, really informative and helpful. I highly recommend this book for anyone with high blood pressure and who wants to slim down or simply to have an healthy body and way of living. I really enjoy the seven-day meal plan making it easy to begin the Dash diet step-by-step.
customer_reviews.author: Chicara

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Very easy book to understand. Simple rules for the diet. Great 10 day food plan. Common ingredients from the kitchen for her recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Great Book for evaluating if this diet is good for you.
customer_reviews.text: A little too basic but it gives a great overview and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Smith

customer_reviews.title: An easy diet
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a very balanced diet and should not be to onerous to follow. I bought these books for my brother's birthday, he was pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Betty J. Button

customer_reviews.title: But my cardiologist recommended it so I decided to try it
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. Just another diet book really. But my cardiologist recommended it so I decided to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Porter

customer_reviews.title: but seems pretty clear how to proceed
customer_reviews.text: have not actually started yet, but seems pretty clear how to proceed. Edited better than the cookbooks.
customer_reviews.author: Pammie L

customer_reviews.title: a dash diet cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty good book. I think I'll try some of these recipes and see for myself. Some good background advice too on a little science! Okay I'll try it!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Finklea

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clear and informative. Use your local library to get the information from this book..
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: A mind (and a body) is a terrible thing to waste.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't read it yet. But my research tells me that it will go hand in hand with the Mediterranean diet. There's another good one out there call the MIND diet. All seem to have a lot in common.
customer_reviews.author: rapages

customer_reviews.title: Not helpful on the actual science behind this diet nor ...
customer_reviews.text: Not helpful on the actual science behind this diet nor the general breakouts or rule of thumb for daily meal plans
customer_reviews.author: a_person

customer_reviews.title: Great Information
customer_reviews.text: Great source of information that anyone can understand. Not just for losing weight, but also for a healthier life style....
customer_reviews.author: Garden Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: ok not as many example of meal as I thought

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Clear Information
customer_reviews.text: The organization of information in this book made more sense than some others I have read. I have a clear understanding of what I can and cannot eat!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great book, everyone with high blood pressure should have this, changed my life.

customer_reviews.text: This is a great healthy way to lose weight and feel better. I'm enjoying the variety of dishes I can have and with the app I downloaded, this is a no brainer.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good information for eating right... even if you don't follow the diet.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not happy thought it's got a lot of recipe, disappointed coz only few are there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes for dash diet!
customer_reviews.text: I love all the recipes in this book! I've been looking for dash diet recipes so I can cook new meals in accordance with my diet. Actually, I've started Dash diet last month, and I can really say that it is really effective! I lose some weights and I'm looking forward to finally achieve a healthier body I've always wanted. And this book has helped me be more determined so I can continue this diet. The mouthwatering recipes in this book are easy to follow and the ingredients are easy to find. Highly recommended book!
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Dash Diet informative book
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this book. Very easy to understand and informative.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This book answered all my questions concerning the diet and it's benefits.
customer_reviews.author: mamamorgan

customer_reviews.title: Concise and full of information.
customer_reviews.text: Best book ever. Just what I was looking for. Changed my entire thinking about food. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: both items were better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today and WoW! Needless to say, both items were better than expected! Thank You and I was also impressed with the quick shipment to my home.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.text: This book was a joke. Terribly written! All information can easily be found with a simple Google search. Immediately returned.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The book had met all of my expectations and is helping me with the lifestyle change.

customer_reviews.title: Ready to eat healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Have yet to try the recipes but all the recipes sound healthy and delicious. Can't wait to try them! Not to mention the amazing health benefits.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great book with lots of great ideas and we truly are enjoying this book

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: My product came as expected and there were no issues.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice review of logic. Points out daily basis of easy choices and change
customer_reviews.author: Connie Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Great info
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to read, understand and follow. This sounds like a very great way to eat for optimal health and nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E.

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Useful recipes, with general information on the diet. Definitely got my money's worth from this book.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Filled with information, but not what I was expecting. Will be trying one of the other books
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great Guide
customer_reviews.text: This is really comprehensive book. Perfect for someone who's new to the dash diet craze. The author does a great job at explaining exactly what the dash diet is. She goes in-depth and shares what it means to be on the dash and gives you the straight facts, so you can jump-start your success! I really liked how the author gives great meal plans for any meal of the day. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Van Cliburn

customer_reviews.title: Not just a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I was horrified by this book, which pretends to promulgate DASH information and science. As we all know, DASH stands for Dietary Approaches to Stop Hypertension, and the food plan was developed using proper studies toward that aim. This book not only muddies the science with disproven myths and old wives tales (64 oz water/day for everyone? Dietary cholesterol/eggs are problematic?) it also has almost zero focus on reducing hypertension in favor of yet another screed on weight loss and how being thin is the ultimate measure of health. Not just a waste of money, this book is outright dangerous, IMO. Stay away if you are looking to *actually* participate in a DASH lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Georgy McPorgy

customer_reviews.title: not like
customer_reviews.text: Normally I read the one star reviews even if the overall review rating looks good. I must have forgot to do that with this purchase. I agree with all the one star reviews. The written part of the book was useless but it would have been very worthwhile if I could have used some of the recipes. None of them looked very tasty, the mixture of ingredients didn't look right, I don't think they had been tested prior to throwing together into the book. I didn't waste a lot of money on the book; but I did waste a lot of money on the recipe ingredients that I had to throw out.
customer_reviews.author: gabalot
